name: A Trip Down Memory Lane
description:
You've entered a musky room, the walls filled with antique toys. Have a chat with the ones that catch your eye, you might learn something new.

Made for the New York University Major Studio Fall course as a one week prototype with constraints derived from patterns found in other prototypes I made: perspective of a child, choices that lack a “good option,” and themes of mortality. 

Inspired by Scythe by Neil Shusterman

Sounds from: FesliyanStudios.com; SweetSoundEffects.com
